title: Brady’s Unretirement and the 20 Best Top-Five NBA Players With Ryen Russillo
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Ryen Russillo to discuss Tom Brady’s announcement that he’s coming out of retirement to play another season with the Buccaneers (2:23), before going through their top 20 NBA players (44:47), thinking about All-NBA teams, and more (1:08:53).

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Ryen Russillo
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
